comments.body: I think you could make this a `noarch` package, which will mean less CI usage once it is merged. See https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html#noarch-python

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "
